TopicTitle: A bunch of combat vehicles. (all stock except for BD-armoury)

Articles.Content:
So here is the second part of my big post, the combat vehicles. In the first part i did the KTT-723 Mammut tank transporter and in the third part i will do the support vehicles.

In this part i will be going thru four combat vehicles:

K1K1 Fabrams. Just your avarage everyday MBT (main battle tank) for taking out your enemys ground vehicles.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/qtfhv72rqgib912/K1K1%20Fabrams.craft?dl=0

K1K2 Skycleaner. A very mobile AA-tank with a goalkeeper and a tracking radar for spraying the airspace with iron.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/9vxarccao2s3ka4/K1K2%20Sky%20Cleaner.craft?dl=0

K114 Carryall. An APC armed with a Minigun for transporting troops in to the field safely.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ztpgwgi2upsjm8c/K114%20Carryall.craft?dl=0

KH-811 Groundpounder. An SPG for all your indirect combat needs.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/8ywkxx774odg5we/KH-811%20Ground%20pounder.craft?dl=0

Here are some picks of them in action.

"Attacking" (Soviet Rhino tank from Red Alert 2)

After a couple of good hits the Skycleaner is down and out .

Tought id take the Skycleaner for a little test and shoot down a real aircraft (seen in the background).

Here is a closer shot of the L-808 witch is my unmanned trnsport aircraft witch i use for target practice.

Now its time to take it out of the sky .

"Thats a hit" (X-Wing fighters from Empire at war).

"Scratched one bogey" (Falco Lombardi from starfox 64)

"And that i how thats done" (Sniper from Team Fortress 2).

"Hold on, this might get tricky" (Miles "Tails" Prower From Sonic-X).

And another one bites the dust.

So there you have it, four combat vehicles from my collection that do different tasks that have on thing in common and that is that they all like to spend time in the front lines forming an unstoppable force of chaos and destruction.

Disclaimer: no kerbals where harmed in the making and testing of these vehicles .

Mods used: BD-armoury

So i hope you enjoyed these little combat vehicles of mine . And go check out the other parts of this post for more military goodness.

Part 1: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/137915-KTT-723-Mammut-tank-transporter

Part 3: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/137950-A-bunch-of-support-vehicles-%28all-stock-except-for-BD-armoury%29

Edited October 30, 2015 by kapteenipirk
Nice armor! How is damage survivability? Once 1.1 has arrived, I'm going to challenge a lot of people with my little tank in mutliplayer and or tournaments ;-)

Thanks:). the vehicles themselfs can take quite a beating (probe core, ammo, rtg:s and batterys are all inside the body) but the guns and turrets themselfs are very fragile aka one good hit and the main turret of the tank and the goalkeeper and they are down and out .
Nice craft, but please learn how to use punctuation/spaces/periods and spell. Please don't take this the wrong way, but I think more people would like this if it were easier to read
thanks . And yea ive never been a very good writer, trust me, im a better speaker than what i am a writer .
